body.name: NUK Newborn Orthodontic Pacifiers, Girl, 0-2 Months, 2-Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 59 mins
features: Orthodontic nipple shape is asymmetrical with a scooped bottom: Flatter to allow for more room for natural sucking motion, slimmer to reduce pressure on jaw and teeth, and narrower to help prevent teeth misalignment
Natural shape is modeled after mom's nipple while breastfeeding and won't cause nipple confusion (Based on Market Research, 2017, tested with 307 pacifier users)
Heart-shaped shield fits perfectly under baby's nose for easy breathing
Pack of 2 orthodontic pacifiers with a smaller nipple, ideal for newborns; Size 0-2 months
BPA-free; silicone nipples; top-rack dishwasher safe; easily clean pacifiers in microwave with new NUK reusable storage case
body.description: Having a difficult time finding the right pacifier for your baby? The new NUK pacifiers are accepted by 95% of babies and feature the improved orthodontic nipple shape. NUK's asymmetrical nipple naturally fits baby's palate and is now improved to allow for more room for a natural sucking motion, reduce pressure on teeth and jaw, and helps prevent teeth misalignment. Invented over 60 years ago by pediatric dentists and doctors, the NUK pacifier is modeled after the natural shape of mom's nipple while breastfeeding. This makes for an easy transition from breast to pacifier and back. The NUK heart-shaped shield fits perfectly under baby's nose for easier breathing and prevents irritation. Now all NUK pacifiers are available in a reusable storage case that allows for easy cleaning in the microwave. With a smaller nipple ideal for newborns, this pack of 2 orthodontic pacifiers is perfect for your baby aged 0-2 months. (Based on Market Research, 2017, tested with 307 pacifier users).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can't express how thrilled I am with the NUK Newborn Orthodontic Pacifiers as a new mom. These pacifiers are tailored perfectly for newborns, providing not only comfort but also supporting healthy oral development.Their orthodontic shape has been incredibly soothing for my baby and made the transition from breastfeeding to pacifier seamless. They've been a source of solace during those fussy moments and have helped my baby self-soothe.What's more, these pacifiers are a breeze to clean and sanitize, which is a real time-saver for us parents. And, let's not forget the charming designs that make them visually appealing.For any new mom, I highly recommend the NUK Newborn Orthodontic Pacifiers. They've become an indispensable part of our daily routine and have my full 5-star endorsement. Don't miss out on these for your newborn!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for small babies
reviews.reviewText: This product is great! Purchased many times. My baby loves these. However, food/liquid does get inside so you will need to change at some point

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for strong gag reflex
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited to find this pacifier since I tried multiple ones and my baby kept gagging on them. This one is much smaller then the rest so he doesn't gag on it and agrees to take it. It was harder to get him to hold on to it but he got better at it and it's better than nothing in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Handle is weird for binky clip attachment
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves the NUK Brand pacifiers, really they have been the only one she latched well too when she was a newborn (had a upper lip tie) I got these as back ups and they work great. The colors are muted, which I love, and the texture on the nipple seems to keep my daughter happy with them. My only negative remark is I’m not a huge fan of the shape of the handle. I typically always have a binky clip attached, and the attachment loop always moves up towards the sides of the handle since it narrows at the top and widens at the bottom. Doesn’t make the pacifier unusable, just a little awkward figuring out which way is top or bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE ONLY PACI BABY WILL TAKE
reviews.reviewText: I tried so many different types of pacifiers and these are the only ones my baby would take! The nipple has more of a curve than most that are bulb shaped. She can hold them in her mouth really well too. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used Nuk pacifiers for my first child and now with my newborn! I love that they come in various colors, definitely will continue to buy them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for newborn
reviews.reviewText: Not sure why they don’t make all pacifiers like these ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not as described. Not sure if someone opened and swapped pacifiers
Mi bebe tiene 4 meses y los ama son los únicos que le gustan, incluso los volví a pedirEstán chiquitos y muy lindos
Son los más pequeños que he encontrado (a mi bebé no le gustaron) pero son bonitos y muy pequeños.
Fue para regalo pero está bien
